app_is_ready: Is ready and running in background

app.leagues_failed_help: Make sure the realm is not under maintenance. Also try clicking on the "Browser" button, you may need to complete a CAPTCHA there.
app.leagues_failed_help_alt: Price check an Item, and follow the instructions in the error description there.
app.thanks_3rd_party: This tool relies on {0} and {1}, consider supporting them as well
app.toggle_browser_hint: Press {0} to switch between browser and game.
app.contact_me: Contact me on one of the PoE Discords,
app.deprecated: This feature is deprecated and will be removed in update {0}

item.parse_error: An error occurred while parsing the item
item.parse_error_help: This is probably a bug and you can report it on GitHub.
item.unknown_help: If this Item was introduced in this League, it will likely be supported in the next app update.
item.identification: You are trying to price check unidentified Unique item with base type "{0}". Which one?

filters.hide_ele_dps: Elemental damage is not the main source of DPS
filters.hide_phys_dps: Physical damage is not the main source of DPS
filters.hide_ele_res: Filtering by exact Elemental Resistance unreasonably increases the price
filters.hide_crafted_chaos: Crafted Chaos Resistance without Explicit mod has no value
filters.hide_for_crafting: Select only if price-checking as base item for crafting
filters.hide_empty_mod: Select only if item has 6 modifiers (1 of which is crafted) or if it has 5 modifiers
filters.hybrid_note: Tier may be incorrect due to the potential for a hybrid mod

online_filter.ratio_tooltip:
Ratio used for sorting locally
Default on trade site is 7.5:1

updates.maybe_outdated: You may have an outdated version
updates.installed_on_exit: It will be installed automatically on exit
updates.download_manually: You can download it from GitHub
updates.download_disabled: You have disabled automatic updates download

trade_viewer.name: Trade Viewer
trade_viewer.logging_header: Listen to game chat for trade requests
trade_viewer.logging_disable_text: Turn off the feature and free up some PC resources
trade_viewer.logging_enable_text: You will receive notifications about trade requests in game
trade_viewer.logging_is_disabled: The feature is turned off. To use it you need to enable it in the widget settings.

filter_generator.name: Filter Generator
filter_generator.update_disclaimer: After you update it, remember to refresh the filter in Settings > Game
filter_generator.about_folder: Filter files folder location (change only if it's not populated by default or is invalid)
filter_generator.about_file_select: Select which filter file will be updated with your custom rules:
filter_generator.about_strategy_select: Additional filter will be put between dedicated comments. If filter file does not have those comments, put extra rules at:
filter_generator.about_disclaimer_text1: As of day of writing this PoE2 developers did not provide us PoE2 dedicated filter instructions.
filter_generator.about_disclaimer_text2: All working filters are based on PoE1 filter instructions. You can find them at
filter_generator.about_disclaimer_text3: Go check full documentation to sell all potential identifiers, there's lots of them.
filter_generator.examples_class_multi: Filtering by class (for belts and Amulets)
filter_generator.examples_complex: Filtering by amulets that dropped on map under level 50 (map level, not waystone tier)
filter_generator.base_type_note: Note: Keys are case-sensitive, ei: BaseType

item_search.name: Item search
item_search.too_many: Too many items found, enter the name more precisely.
item_search.ocr_gems_key: Perform an OCR for a Skill Gem

map_check.name: Map check
map_check.has_outdated: Wording of some stats has been changed. Check and update dangerous map mods in the settings. (This message will be hidden as soon as you remove all outdated stats)

trade_result.results_warn_tooltip: Enable Exalted Only in Online Filter. You can disable this alert in settings.
trade_result.results_warn_message: Trade site hiding results between {0} and {1} ex
trade_result.fix_complex_query: Disable "Use pseudo mods" in settings or log in with builtin browser

settings.title: Settings - Exiled Exchange 2
settings.clear_hotkey: You can clear hotkey by pressing Backspace
settings.overlay_bg: Background when the Overlay is clickable
settings.overlay_bg_focus_game: Clicking on the background focuses the game
settings.overlay_always_close: Always fully close the overlay instead of hiding it
settings.show_overlay_ready: Show a notification when the Overlay detects a PoE window
settings.alphas_warning: Alphas are extremely experimental and will probably not work as expected. Please report any issues you encounter.
settings.show_tips_frequency: How often to show tips when price checking

price_check.name: Price check
price_check.use_pseudo: Use pseudo mods (disable if you have issues with auth)
price_check.builtin_browser_warning: I am aware that future releases can potentially contain malicious code that can steal my POESESSID.
price_check.highlight_hint: Your items will be highlighted even if this setting is off
price_check.extra_delay: Extra time to prevent spurious Rate limiting
price_check.warn_expensive: Settings below are a compromise between increasing load on PoE website and convenient price checking / more accurate search.
price_check.auto_search: Perform an auto search, when pressing
price_check.use_tooltip_hover: Show item when hovering over price
price_check.tier_numbering_help: To try to reduce confusion due to conflicting naming conventions with the game, PoE1 tiers will use the name "Grade" instead of "Tier".

poe2_new.beta_warning: This is in BETA for POE2, things will not work always as expected.
poe2_new.pseudo_note: Pseudo mods not supported by trade site
poe2_new.pseudo_note2: Items may appear to be more valuable than they actually are
poe2_new.parse_error: For some reason this item's stats did not parse.
poe2_new.parse_error2: It likely has a mod that is not supported yet.
poe2_new.parse_error3: (Potentially new or changed wording from poe1)
poe2_new.bulk_exchange: Bulk exchange rates are not implemented yet

tips.tip_1: You can add your own images to the cheat sheet widget by hitting "edit"
tips.tip_2: Selecting too many filters may over estimate the price of an item
tips.tip_3: When hovering over a price, hold SHIFT to show the item's stats
tips.tip_4: Enable "mods" when price checking to see what stats are used for each filter
tips.tip_5: You can switch between PoE1 and PoE2 tier numbering styles in the settings
tips.tip_6: To see the possible modifiers for an item, run item-check and then open in Craft of Exile
tips.tip_7: All actions in the item-check window can be bound to a hotkey
tips.tip_8: You can drag the bars that show when price checking a unique item to change their values
tips.tip_9: You can use the "Fill Iron" button to fill empty rune sockets with iron runes
tips.tip_10: If a stat is not shown, it may be in the "Hidden" section
tips.tip_11: Stats that contribute to a weapon's dps are not shown and instead are factored into the dps filter
tips.tip_12: When a tier is shown on the filter, it means that tier is the best or second best for the item
tips.tip_13: To not have to hold a button to keep price check open, you can use "Auto-hide off" in the settings
tips.tip_14: The "Pseudo" button will open the trade site also, but with resistances as a fake pseudo weighted sum
tips.tip_15: You can use "Profile" to save different map check selections for different characters
tips.tip_16: Use "Find in Stash" to search for a base type in your stash
tips.tip_17: Using "Online filter" allows you to use more meta filtering options like "Exalted only" or "Offline & Online"
tips.tip_19: If you want to time something in the game, you can use the "Stopwatch" widget
tips.tip_20: If you experience any issues, please report them on GitHub
tips.tip_21: You can use the "Stash search" widget to search for items in your stash
tips.tip_22: Map Check can be used to quickly make sure a map doesn't have any mods you don't want
tips.tip_23: To enable Stash Tab Scrolling, disable "Mousewheel Zoom" in PoE settings (Options -> UI)
tips.tip_24: The question mark next to an item's price indicates item is priced using stash tab name and is probably not a real price
tips.tip_25: The orange circle next to an item's price shows player's status is AFK
tips.tip_26: The red circle next to an item's price shows player's status is Offline
tips.tip_27: Logs are shown under the "Debug" tab in settings
tips.tip_28: You can change your league in the settings
tips.tip_29: You can add custom chat command hotkeys in the settings
tips.tip_30: We don't talk about Exiled Exchange 1
